content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Good to meet you, Emilia. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. So, what rental price do you have in mind? I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I am negotiating for the rental price, so I am looking for a good deal.

I have a budget of 800 Euros per month and I want to be able to cover all expenses.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate.

I am not willing to pay more than my budget allows.

I am here to see the apartment and make an offer.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.

TERMINATE.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your requirements, Emilia. However, I am sorry to say that 750 Euros per month is not the lowest price I am willing to accept for my apartment. I am looking for the highest possible price. I suggest we continue our negotiation to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate.

I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

I am here to see the apartment and make an offer.

I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month.

TERMINATE.
